AbstractRK4Integrator Class Reference

a simple base class to do RK4 integration this class then needs the motionFunction to be implemented so we can integrate the values More...

Detailed Description

a simple base class to do RK4 integration this class then needs the motionFunction to be implemented so we can integrate the values

Definition at line 35 of file AbstractRK4Integrator.cpp.

References evaluate(), State::m_position, m_state, and State::m_velocity.

00039 {
00040   // basic RK4 integration we calculate the initial value then two slopes
00041   // and combine together see
00042   // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Runge%E2%80%93Kutta_methods for more details
00043   State a = evaluate(m_state, _t);
00044   State b = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt*0.5f, a);
00045   State c = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt*0.5f, b);
00046   State d = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt, c);
00047   const ngl::Vec3 dxdt = 1.0f/6.0f * (a.m_position + 2.0f*(b.m_position + c.m_position) + d.m_position);
00048   const ngl::Vec3 dvdt = 1.0f/6.0f * (a.m_velocity + 2.0f*(b.m_velocity + c.m_velocity) + d.m_velocity);
00049 
00050   m_state.m_position = m_state.m_position + dxdt*_dt;
00051   m_state.m_velocity = m_state.m_velocity + dvdt*_dt;
00052     //std::cout<<"\n integate val: pos="<<m_state.m_position<<" vel = "<<m_state.m_velocity;
00053 }

virtual ngl::Vec3 AbstractRK4Integrator::motionFunction ( const State &  _state,
float  _t 
) [pure virtual]

the actual function we need to implement for the integration this can be anything this is a pure virtual method an needs to be implemented in the class inheriting this

Parameters:
[in] _state the state we wish to calculate the motion function for
[in] _t the current time step to integrate for

Implemented in ClothParticle.
